text: Giant Tiger Stores Limited is a Canadian chain of discount stores. They have headquarters in Ottawa, Ontario. They have around 265 stores in Canada. In Ontario, the store is known as GTExpress and Scott's Discount and in Quebec it is known as Tigre GÃ©ant. Their mascot is a giant anthropomorphic tiger named Friendly. On May 13, 1961, salesman Gordon Reid opened the first Giant Tiger store at ByWard Market in Ottawa, Ontario. In 1968, Giant Tiger decided to adopt a franchise model for their business. On November 11, 2022, CEO Paul Wood left the company. On September 27, 2023, Gino DiGioacchino was named as the new president and CEO. == References == ==Other website== * Category:1961 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Ottawa Category:Department stores of Canada Category:Discount stores of Canada
